remarks: The binary relationship form of the betweenness predicate.  The statement ` A Btwn <. B , C >. ` should be informally read as " ` A ` lies on a line segment between ` B ` and ` C ` .  This exact definition is abstracted away by Tarski's geometry axioms later on.  (Contributed by Scott Fenton, 3-Jun-2013.)
